definition: a reflex that closes and opens the eyes rapidly, briefly shut the eyes
details:
noun
- a reflex that closes and opens the eyes rapidly
= synonyms: blink
- closing one eye quickly as a signal
- a very short time (as the time it takes the eye to blink or the heart to beat)
= synonyms: instant, flash, heartbeat, blink of an eye, jiffy, split second, trice, twinkling, New York minute
verb
- briefly shut the eyes
= synonyms: blink
- signal by winking
= example: signal by winking
- force to go away by blinking
= synonyms: blink
- gleam or glow intermittently
= synonyms: blink
